welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Hythe, a charming coastal town known for its beautiful beaches and historical charm. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our lovely city has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Southampton Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: East Terminal
terminals.description: The East Terminal at Southampton Airport is primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bembridge Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bournemouth International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Goodwood Airport serves all commercial flights and provides a comfortable and efficient travel experience for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Goodwood Airport caters to the needs of private and charter flights, offering exclusive services and amenities for a luxurious travel experience.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the designated network.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lasham Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lasham Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.
